name: Melon Stuffed With Crab Salad
keywords: appetizer, honeydew, lump crab meat, summer
recipeIngredient: 2 medium zucchini, cut into small dice
1 pound jumbo lump crab meat, picked over for shells
1 cup ripe honeydew melon, cut into 1/4-inch cubes
1 yellow bell pepper, cored and cut into small dice
1 large ripe honeydew melon, quartered lengthwise, seeds scooped out

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees. Place the zucchini on a baking sheet and roast until just tender, about 15 minutes. Let cool. Place the zucchini, crab, melon cubes and bell pepper in a large bowl and toss to combine. Add 1 tablespoon of the mint, the basil, jalapeno, lemon zest, lemon juice, salt and pepper and mix well.
Place 1 melon quarter on each of 4 large plates. Spoon the salad into the hollow of each piece of melon. Sprinkle the remaining mint over the top and serve immediately.
